navigation.join: <button class= "w-full bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded">Join Us</button>

footer.about: A club for students who love to code, create, and launch their ideas. Welcome to the first Hack Club in Tbilisi, where you learn to code by building things you're passionate about.

hero.title: Tbilisi Hack Club
hero.subtitle: A community of makers, coders, and innovators in Tbilisi.

hero_main.title: It's time to build in Tbilisi.
hero_main.description: A club for students who love to code, create, and launch their ideas. Welcome to the first Hack Club in Tbilisi, where you learn to code by building things you're passionate about.

about.title: This is your club.
about.description: Tbilisi Hack Club is a community of young makers, coders, and creators. Our philosophy is simple: the best way to learn is by doing. We provide the space, community, and support. You bring your curiosity and ideas. No experience required.

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.description: Dive into new technologies with hands-on, project-based workshops, from web dev to AI.

meetings.title: Club Meetings
meetings.description: Share what you're working on, get help from peers, and find collaborators for new projects.

hackathons.title: Hackathons
hackathons.description: Join high-energy coding events to build amazing projects in a single weekend.

hero.title: Welcome to Tbilisi Hack Club
hero.description: In a city buzzing with ancient history and a vibrant, emerging tech scene, a new chapter is unfolding. Welcome to a space for young creators, coders, and innovators to come together, learn, and build amazing things.

what_is.title: What is a Hack Club?
what_is.description_1: Forget the stereotypes of stuffy classrooms and rigid curriculums. A Hack Club is a dynamic, hands-on environment where you learn by doing. It's a place to tinker, to experiment, to break things and then build them back better. Here, you'll find a supportive community of peers who share your passion for technology.
what_is.description_2: Our club is for everyone, from absolute beginners to seasoned young developers. We believe that the most powerful learning happens when you're driven by curiosity. We're part of a worldwide network of student-led coding clubs, all fueled by the same philosophy: learning to code is like gaining a superpower.

mission.title: Our Mission: Empowering Georgia's Next Innovators üí°
mission.description: Tbilisi is a city on the rise, and we see incredible potential within our city's youth. Our mission is to provide a platform for you to develop the skills, mindset, and network to thrive in this exciting landscape.

creation.title: Culture of Creation
creation.text: Foster a generation of makers unafraid to experiment and bring ideas to life.

inclusive.title: Inclusive Space
inclusive.text: Find your tribe, collaborate on projects, and learn from one another.

connection.title: Global Connection
connection.text: Access a worldwide community of young innovators and resources.

skills.title: 21st-Century Skills
skills.text: Learn problem-solving, critical thinking, teamwork, and more.

what_we_do.title: What We Do: It's All About Building üõ†Ô∏è

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.text: Dive into practical, hands-on workshops on web dev, Python game creation, hardware design, and more.

pbl.title: Project-Based Learning
pbl.text: Got an idea? We provide the freedom and support to work on projects you're passionate about.

hackathons.title: Hackathons & Events
hackathons.text: Test your skills and create amazing things in local and global competitions.

speakers.title: Guest Speakers
speakers.text: Connect with professionals from Tbilisi's tech scene who will share their experiences.

collaboration.title: Global Collaboration
collaboration.text: Work on projects with members from other Hack Clubs around the world.

what_we_do.note: Our meetings are hands-on, not lectures!

join.title: The Future Is In Your Hands
join.description: Tbilisi has a long and proud history of ingenuity and creativity. As we embrace the digital age, the spirit of innovation continues to thrive. Whether you dream of building the next great Georgian startup, developing cutting-edge technology, or simply want to learn a new skill and have fun, Tbilisi Hack Club is the place for you.

events_page.title: Events
events_page.subtitle: Join us for workshops, hackathons, and more. Let's build something amazing together.
events_page.no_upcoming_message: No upcoming events scheduled at the moment. Check back soon!

join_page.title: Join the Club
join_page.subtitle: Fill out the form below to get started on your journey with us.

form.terms_html: I accept the Terms and Conditions

success_message.title: Thank you for signing up!
success_message.subtitle: We've received your information. Redirecting you to the homepage shortly...

welcome_email.subject: Welcome to Tbilisi Hack Club, {name}!
welcome_email.body_html:
Hi, {name}!

Welcome to Tbilisi Hack Club! We've received your request to join and we're thrilled to have you on board. We will be in touch personally very soon.

In the meantime, feel free to check out our social media channels to see what we're up to:

Telegram • X (Twitter) • Facebook

Have a great day!

Best regards,
Tbilisi Hack Club Administration

github_invite_page.title: Invite to GitHub
github_invite_page.subtitle: Enter a GitHub username to send them an invitation.

why_sponsor.title: Why Sponsor Us?
why_sponsor.subtitle: Your support empowers our community and helps us continue.

free.title: We are free
free.text: Our team works every day and night, while keeping nothing for ourselves.

expensive.title: Functioning of the club is expensive
expensive.text: Our club costs a lot of money to operate, which comes out of our pocket.

impact.title: Community Impact
impact.text: Invest in the local tech education and help foster innovation and collaboration.

contact.title: Ready to Become a Sponsor?
contact.subtitle: We'd love to partner with you. For custom packages or any questions, please reach out to our sponsorship team.

contact_page.title: Get in Touch
contact_page.subtitle: Have a question, a partnership idea, or just want to say hello? We'd love to hear from you.

feedback.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.
feedback.error: An error occurred: {status}. Please try again.
feedback.network_error: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.

auto_reply.subject: Regarding your message to Tbilisi Hack Club
auto_reply.message_body:
Thank you for leaving a message!

We will get back to you soon.

While you wait, you can check out our social media accounts:
https://linktr.ee/tbilisihc

Have a great day!
Best regards,
Tbilisi Hack Club Administration
